title: Learner-Centered Blended Program for Medical Research Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: A non-degree medical research capacity-building program with a learner-customized design combining online and offline activities. Operated around individual research projects and feedback sessions

learning_goals: Learners can develop a research design and data collection plan equivalent to a full medical paper within six months
Learners can conduct three or more feedback sessions on research topics through collaboration with peers and mentors
Learners achieve 80+ points on a comprehensive assessment evaluating core competencies in research ethics, data analysis, and academic writing

resources: Research Methodology Textbooks and Reference Materials

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
